That is what we sit with today as you consider this application. Chair that is an unfortunate state of affairs I submit because the evidence of Mr X who did give evidence and testified before this commission implicated Mr Majola in large scale looting of public funds while he was program manager at the Mhlathuze Water Board. The scheme Chair took money from the public purse that was intended for important projects – water projects in the area and diverted it to private hands.
